sub_title: Project Manager | Program Manager | Deadline & Milestone Management | Business Development | Priority management | Process/Performance Enhancement | Efficiency | Prince2/Agile
summary:
Hello everyone! I'm Zoltan, an action-oriented and accomplished professional with rich experience in program and project maanagement, team training, and continuous process improvement.

Throughout my career, I have remained a resourceful and results-driven professional with a record of overseeing annual roadmaps and resources for 11 brands in 8 countries, steering high-performing teams and executed multiple projects in different areas from outsourcing through office move to application development. As a detail-oriented individual with a passion for excellence, I am adept at developing and implementing project plans, assessing/mitigating risks, and leading high-scale projects from inception to completion, whilst ensuring adherence to set regulations. What makes me stand out is my business experince which helps me to understand both sides of the table when evaluating requests and changes and this makes me very effective in moving projects forward. My stellar record of success in identifying growth opportunities, recommending cost-effective solutions, and finding process improvement opportunities.

My demonstrated success in spearheading varied projects and associated programmes from inception to successful completion within the defined scope and quality is second to none. My ability in communicating project status to key stakeholders and aligning projects with organisation's overall strategy and goals has been well appreciated over the years.

With the aforementioned abilities, I am confident that I will be the best match for the needs of your company. Should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate in reaching out to me.

school.name: Puskas Tivadar Technical College of Communication Engineering

profile_positions.description:
I supported the development and upkeep of approval processes. To track and convey the project's scope, duration, money, and progress, I set up a reporting system. On challenging projects with a large financial stake, I worked with key parties. I oversaw project planning, resource allotment, analysis, and efficiency enhancement. I assisted project managers, promoted development, and dealt with tense circumstances. Using techniques like Waterfall, Agile, and Prince2 for standardisation, I managed projects.
•	Managed project execution procedures for 11 brands across 8 countries in European Union.
•	Drove development and gatekeeper of approval processes to minimise time to approval from 30 to 14 days.
•	Implemented change management process from scratch to support additional requests for projects.

📌My takeaways: when you finish a project, you can never relax, because you can be sure, there is a load of them already coming your direction; manpower is one of the most important factors in delivering projects, you must win them to succeed.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Project Management

profile_positions.description:
I supplied EVP support while I carried out ideas and gathered data for budgets. I oversaw important projects including the launch of an application, the relocation of the corporate headquarters, and the outsourcing of business divisions. I increased operational effectiveness by regularly updating management. I created project management guidelines and unveiled Planview (formerly Clarizen), a global project management platform. In speaking with important vendors, negotiating contracts, and renewing contracts, I made use of my experience.
•	Performed timely integration of 3 acquired brands across 4 countries into existing portfolio within the contractually required 2-year time frame.
•	Invented and then spearheaded a packaging change project over multiple countries which resulted in >€100k annual cost saving
•	Completed office relocation project for HQ on schedule and within a very tight deadline, whilst exceeding expectations and reducing almost 10% expected cost.
•	Oversaw project management control throughout 8 countries for 11 brands.

📌My takeaway: this was the most versatile international environment I have ever worked it. When it comes to different cultures, this is also a skillset one must master.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description:
I was in charge of operations, sales, and marketing efforts. In order to provide the ideal chance to begin the process, I renegotiated the present supplier agreements. I oversaw dealer agreements, kept them up to date, and handled escalated issues to improve efficiency. To prevent fraud, I changed the incentive system for dealers. I achieved my long-term financial objectives via cost-cutting, budgeting, and planning. I investigated potential areas for improvement, addressed, and resolved customer complaints, and simplified processes.
•	Executed wind-up and searched for buyers of customer base of 11000 MMDS and 3000 DTH customers as well as sold for almost €500k to raise 2x revenue.
•	Improved and simplified customer service, reduced time to answer by 50%, lessened number of complaints by 25% by reforming bonus system for dealers, decreased fraud by 20% and saved cost by renegotiating existing contracts up to 15% on monthly costs.

📌My takeaway: life can change in an instant, one day you are hired to build a successful business and then the next day you might need to learn how to sell it. Job well done! ✅
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
I oversaw the development of a new retail business entity, including the employment of staff, and I played a significant part in the process of fitting up our new flagship shop. I took the initiative to create the new site and I streamlined the procedures for the web store. I managed campaigns, created leads through collecting and purchasing, and worked with several marketing firms to assist our sales operation. I actively participated in sales, set up the procedure for managing client complaints, and instructed the sales staff.
•	Coordinated the flagship store's conception and inauguration.
•	Implemented sales procedures and responded to client complaints.
•	Acquired and generated leads for sales.

📌My takeaway: jumping over to another industry is never easy, but it is surely not impossible. With enthusiasm and with vocation you can succeed
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
On the development of a network of retail telecom outlets, I provided advice. I saw ways to potentially increase revenue. I assessed each employee's business and interpersonal coaching prior to their interactions with customers. I looked for ways to increase sales. Each employee received coaching, training, and instructions on the bonus system, including a shift in the incentives for agents to work in shops and sell more.
•	Revamped commission structure to increase over 10% sales of both primary and secondary items.
•	Drove outstanding sales results in all telecom products at local level with dealers of 2-2 stores.

📌My takeaway: there is always room for improvement, no matter what you think, only that sometimes it is not that easy to find it
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor

profile_positions.description:
I oversaw POS and shop-specific door-to-door partners' performance. I oversaw and administered lead generation. By using mystery shopping, I raised the bar for customer service. I hired, encouraged, and rewarded employees based on their performance to maximise the degree of employee satisfaction. To improve operational efficiency, I planned and arranged sales training and developed coaching methods.
•	Administered commission and incentive system management to motivate partners and employees to maximise sales and revenue.
•	Led all sales regions in the country to attain set quotas within defined territories. Incorporated door-to-door sales route within the Direct Sales division.
•	Won 3rd place in customer service excellence across the country through achieving improvements in customer experience.

📌My takeaway: when you cannot compete with prices, you must find something which can differentiate your business from your competitors', preferably something, which your customers will immediately notice
profile_positions.title: National Direct Sales Manager, Deputy Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
I participated in international initiatives, such as supporting the reform of the commission structure in Macedonia (a DT subsidiary), mapping the layout of stores to better understand consumer behaviour, and increasing accessory sales in retail. I established and oversaw monthly goals. I mentored salespeople. I planned team building events.
•	Provided operational oversight of 12 own stores and 4 partners (FTE >200).
•	Directly supervised 40+ staff members, including salespeople, logisticians, and receptionists.
•	Appreciated personnel on monthly and annual basis.
•	Administered logistics of 2 storages.
•	Interviewed and hired 500+ employees.
•	I won the annual sales competition of Deutsche Telekom with 2 different stores in 4 consecutive years within EU

📌My takeaway: with hard work you can reach the stars. I will always be a Sales Shark 🦈 in my inner soul, passionate and convincing. Communication is the key, and I had a lot of time to master it.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Regional Manager
